info.title: USA Today Best-Selling Books
info.description: The USA TODAY Best-Selling Books API provides a method for retrieving the weekly list of the nationu2019s top-selling books as compiled by USA TODAY and published each Thursday. In addition, the API can be used to access a title's history on the list and metadata about each title. All bestseller information is available in a custom handler.

get.description: The USA TODAY Best-Selling Books API provides a method for retrieving the weekly list of the nationu2019s top-selling books as compiled by USA TODAY and published each Thursday. In addition, the API can be used to access a titles history on the list and metadata about each title. All bestseller information is available in a custom handler.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: A call to the /categories directory returns a list of categories used to classify books.

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: A call to the /classes directory returns a list of available book classes (fiction or non-fiction).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Programmers may specify the number of books they would like returned in a list.

parameters.name: dates
parameters.description: Specifying a year within the dates directory returns the dates of each weekly books list for that particular year.

parameters.name: maxyear
parameters.description: Programmers can use minyear and maxyear to establish a year range for the data returned.

parameters.name: minyear
parameters.description: Programmers can use minyear and maxyear to establish a year range for the data returned.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A call to the /titles directory returns a list of titles that have appeared on the books list.

properties.description: Keywords assigned by the articleu2019s author

1.description: Flag to designate u201ctimelessu201d articles, always topically relevant

3.description: Earliest date article can be published (default sort)

5.description: Date the article was last updated

6.description: Type of content embodied by the article

7.description: Phase of exporting that a business should be in to benefit from the article

8.description: Industry category assigned to this article

11.description: Trade region covered by an articleu2019s content

12.description: World region covered by an articleu2019s content

13.description: Would sub-region covered by an articleu2019s content

14.description: Country covered by an articleu2019s content

15.description: Keywords assigned by the articleu2019s author
